entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is hiding his book and searching for a place to do so. He is described as walking up and down in front of a blank wall, opening his eyes to find the door to the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: A magical room that can be accessed by those who need it. It is described as being hidden behind a blank wall and has a large size with high windows sending shafts of light down upon what looks like a city.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic that has been mentioned in the story. It is described as having inhabitants who have hidden objects over generations.

entities.name: bathro om
entities.description: A location where Harry fears what awaits him. The exact nature of his fear is not specified.

relationships.description: Harry accesses the Room of Requirement by opening its door and slamming it shut. He is described as being overawed by what he sees inside.
